blog.name: seokjinssymphony
blog.description: Kami | 18 | Seokjin-biased | Navigation | Requests: Open | Buy Me a 🥂 |

summary: OMG Guys here it is XD I've been working on this moodboard for quite a while now. Anyways, this is the moodboard to go with my...
body: OMG Guys here it is XD I’ve been working on this moodboard for quite a while now. Anyways, this is the moodboard to go with my Seokjin Mafia fic (that still isn’t finished 😅) and I’m happy with it. I’m working on the moodboards to go with BTS as hybrids now. Let me just say, I cannot remember the author on here but I recently read some hybrid fics that were like uncommon ones? I distinctly remember Jin was a hyena and I love that thought! Not just because of his laugh but his nature too, if anyone can tell me who the author is I would appreciate it very much and be sure to give them lots of love!!

title: BTS roleplay
body:
Is anyone up to roleplay? (I’d like a long time partner not something just for one day)


Requirements:

-I’d like someone active who can more or less reply during all day

-I have CET timezone so someone with the same timezone would be preferable, if it is another timezone we can talk things

-20+ I am looking for someone my age so that’s important, if you are 20- please don’t apply.


More info:

-I don’t mind the ship but I’ll be roleplaying as Jimin so any other member from BTS is welcome (we could even talk things if you want to portray an idol who is not in BTS)

-The Jimin I portray can be both bottom and top (prefers to bottom tho) and mostly he is sub even tho in some situations he can be a bit dominant (if you portray your character as mostly sub please don’t apply, Jimin is dominant sometimes not all the time)

-I usually roleplay in text format (if they are texting) and semi lit / lit  (when scenes are happening when the characters meet face to face)

-I really like AU’s so i’m always open to listen to whatever ideas you have, I can also work with idolverse, I’m really open to almost anything.

-Smut is accepted but I don’t want to make it the main thing of the roleplay, I just want it to be there as one more part of the development of the story.

-I roleplay on kakaotalk but I’d also be open to roleplay here on the DM’s or on discord.



If you are interested please send me a DM or like this post and I’ll reach to you!
